description: This file defines the interface for message bus interactions in the SSP component, including function prototypes for engaging the message bus, initialization, cleanup, checks, and resource management, as well as a utility function for waiting on condition readiness.
external_methods: BOOLEAN waitConditionReady(void* hMBusHandle, const char* dst_component_id, char* dbus_path, char* src_component_id)

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or connects the message bus for a specific component with given configuration.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check on the message bus status using user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with a specified priority associated with user data.

methods.name: waitConditionReady
methods.description: Utility function to wait until a certain condition or readiness state is achieved in the message bus, given handle and component identifiers.

calls: BOOLEAN waitConditionReady(void* hMBusHandle, const char* dst_component_id, char* dbus_path, char* src_component_id)
